title: New:  Knxwledge. – togethrniss_∆_side
content:
Goddamn.

Knxwledge sure puts out a lot of beat tapes. When I say ‘a lot’, I’m not quite sure you know how many I mean. Head over to his Bandcamp for a scan, there’s a lot to get lost in. His new piece of work togethrniss_∆_side is a lo-fi analogue filtered dream world to end the year in, or indeed the world. The samples are few and far between, instead layered sounds and synths are looped for an at times aggravating experience. Aggravating in a good way I might add, always in a good way.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
